articles.title: Why natural gas prices have surged to some of their highest levels in years - CBC.ca
articles.description: A confluence of events in North America and Europe — from summer storms to an overseas supply crunch — have contributed to sharp increases in the price of the fossil fuel.
articles.content:
Natural gas prices have climbed to some of their highest levels in years, with the increases expected to ripple into people's gas bills as winter fast approaches.

articles.description: West Ham made light work of their first-ever European group game with a 2-0 win at Dinamo Zagreb in the Europa League.

articles.author: Jeevan Ravindran, CNN
articles.title: The ozone hole over the South Pole is now bigger than Antarctica - CNN
articles.description: The hole in the ozone that forms every year over the South Pole is now larger than Antarctica, scientists from the European Union's Copernicus Atmosphere Monitoring Service said Thursday.
articles.content:
(CNN)The hole in the ozone that forms every year over the South Pole is now larger than Antarctica, scientists from the European Union's Copernicus Atmosphere Monitoring Service said Thursday.

articles.title: Realme Narzo 50 Series Tipped to Launch in India Next Week, Realme Band 2 May Also Debut - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Realme Narzo 50 series is tipped to launch in India next week. The Narzo 50A handset has been officially teased by the company’s India and Europe CMO, Francis Wong. The new series is said to include Narzo 50A, Narzo 50, and Narzo 50 Pro. Realme Band 2 is also…
articles.content: Realme Narzo 50 series is expected to bring the next Narzo-branded smartphones from the Chinese manufacture following the Realme Narzo 30 series. The Narzo 50A has been in rumours for quite a while a… [+2204 chars]
